    • Method Detail

      • escapeSelector

        public static final String escapeSelector(String string)
        Escapes the provided string into a valid CSS selector. The string will be converted to lowercase, and all non-ASCII characters replaced with '-'
        Parameters:
        string - the string to escape
        Returns:
        the escaped string

        public static final Object getInherited(com.day.cq.commons.inherit.InheritanceValueMap properties,
                  String key,
                  Object defaultOrType)
        Gets an inherited value from an inheritance value map.
        Parameters:
        properties - the inheritance value map from which to get the property
        key - the key of the property to retrieve
        defaultOrType - either the default value or a class in which to coerse the value
        Returns:
        the value
